instructions: Login to Badoo . When you first launch the app, clicking profile becomes your gateway into the service. Buy Super Powers . Under the Super Power menu item, as illustrated above, you can purchase a package to unlock these premium features and help you meet more people. Monitor Credit Balances. Click the Badoo Credits menu to view your current balance plus refill your credit account to purchase premium features. Notifications . Set your alert preferences for Messages, Visitors, Alerts, when someone wants to meet you, and for new mutual attractions. Privacy . Choose whether to show your distance and your online status through the privacy menu. Sign Out . Under the Account menu, you can log off Badoo for Android completely, preventing delivery of notifications and messages until you log in again.
